title: Azir 38% win rate
body:
He was my favorite champion, but I think the nerf to his range on W aa make him near unplayable especially in late game. It's ridiculously easy to walk out of range now and since his Q poke his lower, he does almost no damage in lane. He can get maybe one aa in or two with good positioning. Maybe three if he burns his entire kit. Thats like 300 damage and half his mana.

Please compensate. Maybe adding range and lowering his early base damage on the AA or lowering Q damage even more. Please.

For shurima?

replies.body:
We're working on some Azir buffs at the moment, the recent nerfs hit him harder than intended. It's very likely, though not guaranteed yet, that those changes will include adding at least some range back onto his W. 

Odds are high those buffs will be in the 5.5 patch (5.4's already locked so we can't do the next patch, we would like to get these out as soon as feasible though).
wait, so that means that the veigar changes are locked too? Is riot really satisfied with the E nerfs despite both testers and non-testers alike saying that .75secs is just too long of a delay?

The Veigar changes for 5.4 are locked. Directionally we believe a delay on Veigar's E is essential to making Veigar healthy (so that we can be happy if he's strong and popular, rather than definitely having to nerf him if that happens). If that delay does prove to be too long we'll reduce it, given it's much harder to shut Veigar's laning down given the extra range and shorter CD on his Q however that delay's our best estimate on appropriate for the upcoming patch.

How is the delay essential for counterplay when we have champions like {{champion:238}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:64}} and{{champion:429}} who NEED to be locked down instantly?  Do you honestly expect they're going to get caught in the E that takes .75 seconds to activate??  Mobility is an issue that is NOT being addressed by Riot, and this delay added to his E is laughing at the problem.

Edit: How about {{champion:55}} who can now be picked into him and get her kill combo off on you or your team before the clutch stun to stop her ult?  Instant AoE stuns aren't good for League's health unless it's used to stop the rampant mobility creep you've created and done nothing about other than highlight them in your #BigPlays clips.

Point and click hard CC is the ONLY counter play to high mobility if the champion you are playing has no mobility. (ie Veigar) This is the main problem with mobility creep. Riot is accelerating the rate of mobility creep by taking out the ONLY thing that counters it. Basically it is saying "**play our hyper cool LCS champs or you are going to lose your games**".

This is it, I tried to defend Meddler and Ghostcrawler. But I'm done. This is stupid as shit. If the "balance" team thinks this is good then the "balance" team if full of idiots.

edit: 
There is a reason the LCS games seem to be taking longer and have lower kills this season. It's not the skill level of the players. It's the fact that every damn champion has built in safety. Lee, Zed, LB, Liss, Gnar, Kalista, ect... have so much mobility that you can't catch them. You can't punish them for bad plays. With the removal of point and click CC this only gets worse and worse.

That's just the thing right there, ATM Veigar has little to no counters, adding the delay to his e makes him a rounder champion and he has more counters. He is still stronger then some of the weaker champions, plus the since they gave him a larger range he doesn't need to get in so close to burst someone, cs, or even poke. Now instead of being a 100-0 burst champ he might be 100-50 because he won't get a guaranteed stun. Before this last patch veigar required little skill now the players will need to time his stun.
Just...no.  Do you even play Veigar?  Maybe you main Karthus, since that's the only champ Veigar really just demolished.  He is countered by almost every meta mid laner out there.

It is amazing how many people think Veigar "has no counter". If he's farming with his Q he can't trade. So his entire kit is 100-0. That's fine if they wish to change it. But you better give him 2 mobility and 3 utility spells to catch him up to the other strong mid lanners.
It isn't about making Veigar healthy. it's about giving the champs you listed chances to make LC$ big plays.
